---------- Input ----------
select * exclude c1, b.* exclude (c2, c3, c4) from customer inner join orders on a = b limit 1
---------- Output ---------
SELECT * EXCLUDE (c1), b.* EXCLUDE (c2, c3, c4) FROM customer INNER JOIN orders ON (a = b) LIMIT 1
---------- AST ------------
Query {
    span: Some(
        0..94,
    ),
    with: None,
    body: Select(
        SelectStmt {
            span: Some(
                0..86,
            ),
            distinct: false,
            select_list: [
                QualifiedName {
                    qualified: [
                        Star,
                    ],
                    exclude: Some(
                        [
                            Identifier {
                                name: "c1",
                                quote: None,
                                span: Some(
                                    17..19,
                                ),
                            },
                        ],
                    ),
                },
                QualifiedName {
                    qualified: [
                        Identifier(
                            Identifier {
                                name: "b",
                                quote: None,
                                span: Some(
                                    21..22,
                                ),
                            },
                        ),
                        Star,
                    ],
                    exclude: Some(
                        [
                            Identifier {
                                name: "c2",
                                quote: None,
                                span: Some(
                                    34..36,
                                ),
                            },
                            Identifier {
                                name: "c3",
                                quote: None,
                                span: Some(
                                    38..40,
                                ),
                            },
                            Identifier {
                                name: "c4",
                                quote: None,
                                span: Some(
                                    42..44,
                                ),
                            },
                        ],
                    ),
                },
            ],
            from: [
                Join {
                    span: Some(
                        60..70,
                    ),
                    join: Join {
                        op: Inner,
                        condition: On(
                            BinaryOp {
                                span: Some(
                                    83..84,
                                ),
                                op: Eq,
                                left: ColumnRef {
                                    span: Some(
                                        81..82,
                                    ),
                                    database: None,
                                    table: None,
                                    column: Identifier {
                                        name: "a",
                                        quote: None,
                                        span: Some(
                                            81..82,
                                        ),
                                    },
                                },
                                right: ColumnRef {
                                    span: Some(
                                        85..86,
                                    ),
                                    database: None,
                                    table: None,
                                    column: Identifier {
                                        name: "b",
                                        quote: None,
                                        span: Some(
                                            85..86,
                                        ),
                                    },
                                },
                            },
                        ),
                        left: Table {
                            span: Some(
                                51..59,
                            ),
                            catalog: None,
                            database: None,
                            table: Identifier {
                                name: "customer",
                                quote: None,
                                span: Some(
                                    51..59,
                                ),
                            },
                            alias: None,
                            travel_point: None,
                        },
                        right: Table {
                            span: Some(
                                71..77,
                            ),
                            catalog: None,
                            database: None,
                            table: Identifier {
                                name: "orders",
                                quote: None,
                                span: Some(
                                    71..77,
                                ),
                            },
                            alias: None,
                            travel_point: None,
                        },
                    },
                },
            ],
            selection: None,
            group_by: [],
            having: None,
        },
    ),
    order_by: [],
    limit: [
        Literal {
            span: Some(
                93..94,

            lit: UInt64(
                1,
            ),
        },
    ],
    offset: None,
    ignore_result: false,
}


---------- Input ----------

---------- Output ---------

---------- AST ------------
Query {
    span: Some(
        0..40,
    ),
    with: None,
    body: Select(
        SelectStmt {
            span: Some(
                0..40,
            ),
            distinct: false,
            select_list: [
                QualifiedName {
                    qualified: [
                        Star,
                    ],
                    exclude: None,
                },
            ],
            from: [
                Join {
                    span: Some(
                        23..33,
                    ),
                    join: Join {
                        op: Inner,
                        condition: None,
                        left: Table {
                            span: Some(
                                14..22,
                            ),
                            catalog: None,
                            database: None,
                            table: Identifier {
                                name: "customer",
                                quote: None,
                                span: Some(
                                    14..22,
                                ),
                            },
                            alias: None,
                            travel_point: None,
                        },
                        right: Table {
                            span: Some(
                                34..40,
                            ),
                            catalog: None,
                            database: None,
                            table: Identifier {
                                name: "orders",
                                quote: None,
                                span: Some(
                                    34..40,
                                ),
                            },
                            alias: None,
                            travel_point: None,
                        },
                    },
                },
            ],
            selection: None,
            group_by: [],
            having: None,
        },
    ),
    order_by: [],
    limit: [],
    offset: None,
    ignore_result: false,
}


---------- Input ----------
select * from customer cross join orders
---------- Output ---------
SELECT * FROM customer CROSS JOIN orders
---------- AST ------------
Query {
    span: Some(
        0..40,
    ),
    with: None,
    body: Select(
        SelectStmt {
            span: Some(
                0..40,
            ),
            distinct: false,
            select_list: [
                QualifiedName {
                    qualified: [
                        Star,
                    ],
                    exclude: None,
                },
            ],
            from: [
                Join {
                    span: Some(
                        23..33,
                    ),
                    join: Join {
                        op: CrossJoin,
                        condition: None,
                        left: Table {
                            span: Some(
                                14..22,
                            ),
                            catalog: None,
                            database: None,
                            table: Identifier {
                                name: "customer",
                                quote: None,
                                span: Some(
                                    14..22,
                                ),
                            },
                            alias: None,
                            travel_point: None,
                        },
                        right: Table {
                            span: Some(
                                34..40,
                            ),
                            catalog: None,
                            database: None,
                            table: Identifier {
                                name: "orders",
                                quote: None,
                                span: Some(
                                    34..40,
                                ),
                            },
                            alias: None,
                            travel_point: None,
                        },
                    },
                },
            ],
            selection: None,
            group_by: [],
            having: None,
        },
    ),
    order_by: [],
    limit: [],
    offset: None,
    ignore_result: false,
}

    ),

            span: Some(

                QualifiedName {
                    qualified: [
                        Star,
                    ],
                    exclude: None,
                },
            ],
            from: [
                Join {
                    span: Some(
                        23..33,
                    ),
                    join: Join {
                        op: Inner,
                        condition: On(
                            BinaryOp {
                                span: Some(
                                    46..47,
                                ),
                                op: Eq,

                                    span: Some(
                                        44..45,

---------- Input ----------

---------- Output ---------

---------- AST ------------
Query {
    span: Some(
        0..47,
    ),
    with: None,
    body: Select(
        SelectStmt {
            span: Some(
                0..47,
            ),
            distinct: false,
            select_list: [
                QualifiedName {
                    qualified: [
                        Star,
                    ],
                    exclude: None,
                },
            ],
            from: [
                Join {
                    span: Some(
                        23..40,
                    ),
                    join: Join {
                        op: FullOuter,
                        condition: Natural,
                        left: Table {
                            span: Some(
                                14..22,
                            ),
                            catalog: None,
                            database: None,
                            table: Identifier {
                                name: "customer",
                                quote: None,
                                span: Some(
                                    14..22,
                                ),
                            },
                            alias: None,
                            travel_point: None,
                        },
                        right: Table {
                            span: Some(
                                41..47,
                            ),
                            catalog: None,
                            database: None,

                                name: "orders",
                                quote: None,
                                span: Some(
                                    41..47,
                                ),
                            },
                            alias: None,
                            travel_point: None,
                        },
                    },
                },
            ],
            selection: None,
            group_by: [],
            having: None,
        },
    ),
    order_by: [],
    limit: [],
    offset: None,
    ignore_result: false,
}


---------- Input ----------

---------- Output ---------

---------- AST ------------
Query {
    span: Some(
        0..76,
    ),
    with: None,
    body: Select(
        SelectStmt {
            span: Some(
                0..76,
            ),
            distinct: false,
            select_list: [
                QualifiedName {
                    qualified: [
                        Star,
                    ],
                    exclude: None,
                },
            ],
            from: [
                Join {
                    span: Some(
                        43..58,
                    ),
                    join: Join {
                        op: LeftOuter,
                        condition: Using(
                            [
                                Identifier {
                                    name: "id",
                                    quote: None,
                                    span: Some(
                                        73..75,
                                    ),
                                },
                            ],
                        ),
                        left: Join {
                            span: Some(
                                23..35,
                            ),
                            join: Join {
                                op: Inner,
                                condition: Natural,
                                left: Table {
                                    span: Some(
                                        14..22,
                                    ),
                                    catalog: None,
                                    database: None,
                                    table: Identifier {
                                        name: "customer",
                                        quote: None,
                                        span: Some(
                                            14..22,
                                        ),
                                    },

                                    travel_point: None,

                                        name: "orders",
                                        quote: None,

                                },
                            },

                            span: Some(
                                59..65,

                                quote: None,
                                span: Some(
                                    59..65,

                            },
                            alias: None,
                            travel_point: None,

            group_by: [],

    span: Some(
        0..70,
    ),

            span: Some(
                0..32,

                    span: Some(
                        5..32,
                    ),

                            name: "t2",
                            quote: None,

                                5..7,
                            ),

        0..64,
    ),

---------- Input ----------
with t2(tt) as (select a from t), t3 as (select * from t), t4 as (select a from t where a > 1) select t2.tt, t3.a, t4.a from t2, t3, t4 where t2.tt > 1
---------- Output ---------
WITH t2(tt) AS (SELECT a FROM t), t3 AS (SELECT * FROM t), t4 AS (SELECT a FROM t WHERE (a > 1)) SELECT t2.tt, t3.a, t4.a FROM t2, t3, t4 WHERE (t2.tt > 1)
---------- AST ------------
Query {
    span: Some(
        0..151,
    ),
    with: Some(
        With {
            span: Some(
                0..94,
            ),
            recursive: false,
            ctes: [
                CTE {
                    span: Some(
                        5..32,
                    ),
                    alias: TableAlias {
                        name: Identifier {
                            name: "t2",
                            quote: None,
                            span: Some(
                                5..7,
                            ),
                        },
                        columns: [
                            Identifier {
                                name: "tt",
                                quote: None,
                                span: Some(

---------- Input ----------
with recursive t2(tt) as (select a from t1 union select tt from t2) select t2.tt from t2
---------- Output ---------

---------- AST ------------

        0..88,
    ),

---------- Input ----------
select c_count cc, count(*) as custdist, sum(c_acctbal) as totacctbal
            from customer, orders ODS,
                (
                    select
                        c_custkey,
                        count(o_orderkey)
                    from
                        customer left outer join orders on
                            c_custkey = o_custkey
                            and o_comment not like '%:1%:2%'
                    group by
                        c_custkey
                ) as c_orders
            group by c_count
            order by custdist desc nulls first, c_count asc, totacctbal nulls last
            limit 10, totacctbal
---------- Output ---------
SELECT c_count AS cc, COUNT(*) AS custdist, sum(c_acctbal) AS totacctbal FROM customer, orders AS ODS, (SELECT c_custkey, count(o_orderkey) FROM customer LEFT OUTER JOIN orders ON ((c_custkey = o_custkey) AND (o_comment NOT LIKE '%:1%:2%')) GROUP BY c_custkey) AS c_orders GROUP BY c_count ORDER BY custdist DESC NULLS FIRST, c_count ASC, totacctbal NULLS LAST LIMIT 10, totacctbal
---------- AST ------------

---------- Input ----------
select * from t1 union select * from t2
---------- Output ---------
SELECT * FROM t1 UNION SELECT * FROM t2
---------- AST ------------
Query {
    span: Some(
        0..39,
    ),
    with: None,
    body: SetOperation(
        SetOperation {
            span: Some(
                17..22,
            ),
            op: Union,
            all: false,
            left: Select(
                SelectStmt {
                    span: Some(
                        0..16,
                    ),
                    distinct: false,
                    select_list: [
                        QualifiedName {
                            qualified: [
                                Star,
                            ],
                            exclude: None,
                        },
                    ],
                    from: [
                        Table {
                            span: Some(
                                14..16,
                            ),
                            catalog: None,
                            database: None,
                            table: Identifier {
                                name: "t1",
                                quote: None,
                                span: Some(
                                    14..16,
                                ),
                            },
                            alias: None,
                            travel_point: None,
                        },
                    ],
                    selection: None,
                    group_by: [],
                    having: None,
                },
            ),
            right: Select(
                SelectStmt {
                    span: Some(
                        23..39,
                    ),
                    distinct: false,
                    select_list: [
                        QualifiedName {
                            qualified: [
                                Star,
                            ],
                            exclude: None,
                        },
                    ],
                    from: [
                        Table {
                            span: Some(
                                37..39,
                            ),
                            catalog: None,
                            database: None,
                            table: Identifier {
                                name: "t2",
                                quote: None,
                                span: Some(
                                    37..39,
                                ),
                            },
                            alias: None,
                            travel_point: None,
                        },
                    ],
                    selection: None,
                    group_by: [],
                    having: None,
                },
            ),
        },
    ),
    order_by: [],
    limit: [],
    offset: None,
    ignore_result: false,
}


---------- Input ----------
select * from t1 except select * from t2
---------- Output ---------
SELECT * FROM t1 EXCEPT SELECT * FROM t2
---------- AST ------------
Query {
    span: Some(
        0..40,
    ),
    with: None,
    body: SetOperation(
        SetOperation {
            span: Some(
                17..23,
            ),
            op: Except,
            all: false,
            left: Select(
                SelectStmt {
                    span: Some(
                        0..16,
                    ),
                    distinct: false,
                    select_list: [
                        QualifiedName {
                            qualified: [
                                Star,
                            ],
                            exclude: None,
                        },
                    ],
                    from: [
                        Table {
                            span: Some(
                                14..16,
                            ),
                            catalog: None,
                            database: None,
                            table: Identifier {
                                name: "t1",
                                quote: None,
                                span: Some(
                                    14..16,
                                ),
                            },
                            alias: None,
                            travel_point: None,
                        },
                    ],
                    selection: None,
                    group_by: [],
                    having: None,
                },

            right: Select(

                    span: Some(
                        24..40,

                    distinct: false,

                            qualified: [
                                Star,

                            exclude: None,

                            span: Some(
                                38..40,

                            alias: None,
                            travel_point: None,

                    having: None,

    span: Some(
        0..66,
    ),

            span: Some(

---------- Input ----------

---------- Output ---------

---------- AST ------------
Query {
    span: Some(
        0..66,
    ),
    with: None,
    body: SetOperation(
        SetOperation {
            span: Some(
                17..22,
            ),
            op: Union,
            all: false,
            left: Select(
                SelectStmt {
                    span: Some(
                        0..16,
                    ),
                    distinct: false,
                    select_list: [
                        QualifiedName {
                            qualified: [
                                Star,
                            ],
                            exclude: None,
                        },
                    ],
                    from: [
                        Table {
                            span: Some(
                                14..16,
                            ),
                            catalog: None,
                            database: None,
                            table: Identifier {
                                name: "t1",
                                quote: None,
                                span: Some(
                                    14..16,
                                ),
                            },
                            alias: None,
                            travel_point: None,
                        },
                    ],
                    selection: None,
                    group_by: [],
                    having: None,
                },
            ),
            right: SetOperation(
                SetOperation {
                    span: Some(
                        40..49,
                    ),
                    op: Intersect,
                    all: false,
                    left: Select(
                        SelectStmt {
                            span: Some(
                                23..39,
                            ),
                            distinct: false,
                            select_list: [
                                QualifiedName {
                                    qualified: [
                                        Star,
                                    ],
                                    exclude: None,
                                },
                            ],
                            from: [
                                Table {
                                    span: Some(
                                        37..39,

                                    catalog: None,
                                    database: None,

                                        name: "t2",
                                        quote: None,
                                        span: Some(
                                            37..39,
                                        ),
                                    },
                                    alias: None,
                                    travel_point: None,
                                },
                            ],
                            selection: None,
                            group_by: [],
                            having: None,
                        },
                    ),
                    right: Select(
                        SelectStmt {
                            span: Some(
                                50..66,
                            ),
                            distinct: false,

                                    qualified: [

                                    ],
                                    exclude: None,
                                },

                            having: None,

    ignore_result: false,
}

---------- AST ------------

    span: Some(
        0..64,
    ),
    with: None,
    body: SetOperation(
        SetOperation {
            span: Some(
                42..47,

                SetOperation {
                    span: Some(
                        18..23,
                    ),
                    op: Union,
                    all: false,

                        SelectStmt {
                            span: Some(
                                1..17,
                            ),
                            distinct: false,

---------- Output ---------

---------- AST ------------
Query {
    span: Some(
        0..64,
    ),
    with: None,
    body: SetOperation(
        SetOperation {
            span: Some(
                17..22,
            ),
            op: Union,
            all: false,
            left: Select(
                SelectStmt {
                    span: Some(
                        0..16,
                    ),
                    distinct: false,

                            qualified: [
                                Star,
                            ],
                            exclude: None,
                        },
                    ],
                    from: [

                            span: Some(
                                14..16,
                            ),
                            catalog: None,
                            database: None,

                                name: "t1",
                                quote: None,
                                span: Some(
                                    14..16,

                            travel_point: None,
                        },

                    having: None,
